channel.title: ::thread #### -- Will rep++
channel.description:
Hey so has anyone got any tutorials, or code for a command that opens up a forums post? E.G: ::thread 0933 <-- The thread number being 0933 ofc. I'm using vbulletin forums and Pi 317/602 Erasedpkz.
Will rep++!

item.title: ::thread #### -- Will rep++
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

You can use JBDC which is a SQL API in Java. Learn SQL if you don’t know it already, and then fetch table information from the vBulletin database.

Read full topic
